bug.author: decentralion
bug.summary: TensorBoard prints warning: TAG not not found
bug.description:
On start, TensorBoard prints the following message: <denchmark-code>WARNING:tensorflow:IOError [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/Users/danmane/tensorflow/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/TAG' on path /Users/danmane/tensorflow/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/TAG WARNING:tensorflow:Unable to read TensorBoard tag </denchmark-code>
This issue is harmless but distracting.
